verses.verse: <S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> God, by your <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H1777>Vindicate<s%> me in your <S%H1369>might.<s%>

For <S%H2114>strangers<s%> have risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H6184>me.<s%> Violent men have <S%H1245>sought<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> They <S%H7760>haven't<s%> set <S%H430>God<s%> before <S%H5542>them.<s%> Selah.
<S%H430>Behold,<s%> God is my <S%H5826>helper.<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is the <S%H5315>one<s%> who sustains my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
He will <S%H7725>repay<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> to my <S%H8324>enemies.<s%> <S%H6789>Destroy<s%> them in your <S%H571>truth.<s%>
With a free will <S%H5071>offering,<s%> I will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3034>you.<s%> I will give thanks to your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for it is <S%H2896>good.<s%>
For he has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of all <S%H6869>trouble.<s%> My <S%H5869>eye<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> triumph over my <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
